Text: could you please help me I've become fascinated by the days of future past that ran originally in the Claremont/Byrne era. There are some related stories in Excalibur and Wolverine days of future past . I would love to read the whole thing.
do you have a complilation of the days of future storyline that involved the dystopian future where the sentinels take over. I would love to read the wolverine days of story;ine
you make a lot of people very happy. thanks  for helping us with hard to find cbr . you are an excellent human.

did everyone hear that? i'm an excellent human. i'm going to tell my wife that means she can load the dishwasher!
